channel.title: Pendant Productions - Once Upon a Time in Vegas

image.title: Pendant Productions - Once Upon a Time in Vegas
image.description: Once Upon a Time in Vegas

channel.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
channel.itunes:subtitle: Pendant Productions - Once Upon a Time in Vegas
channel.itunes:summary: "Once Upon a Time in Vegas" is a full-cast, fantasy maxi-series serial drama with one new episode every month.
channel.itunes:keywords: otr, old time radio, radio drama, sci-fi, science fiction, fantasy, fairy tales

item.title: Chapter 33 - Cold Feet
item.description: Chapter 33 - Family invades, Abby schools Casper and two alphas face-off!

item.title: Chapter 33 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 33

item.title: Chapter 32 - Fear
item.description: Chapter 32 - Maria hunts Jeff while fear eats Abby!

item.title: Chapter 32 COMMENTARY
item.description: Co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 32

item.title: Chapter 31 - Hidden Messages
item.description: Chapter 31 - Todd runs into Princess, the past haunts Robert and Abby and Jeff gets a spirited ultimatum!

item.title: Chapter 31 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Rene Christine Jones and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 31

item.title: Chapter 30 - Contact
item.description: Chapter 30 - Teri reunites with Tessa and Chloe while Abby reflects and the frat boys ghost hunt!

item.title: Chapter 30 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Rene Christine Jones and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 30

item.title: Chapter 29 - Wake Up Call
item.description: Chapter 29 - Dangerous secrets are revealed as Chloe and Phillip are reunited and Teri is taken off life support!

item.title: Chapter 29 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Rene Christine Jones and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 29

item.title: Chapter 28 - Full Circle
item.description: Chapter 28 - Tessa and Jeff wrestle with the havoc that Chloe has unleashed!

item.title: Chapter 28 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Rene Christine Jones and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 28

item.title: Chapter 27 - Apples to Ashes
item.description: Chapter 27 - The Frat Boys fight to keep Teri alive while Tessa and Jeff are trampled by a monster!

item.title: Chapter 27 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Rene Christine Jones and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 27

item.title: Chapter 26 - Revelations
item.description: Chapter 26 - Time ticks away for Ginger while Teri lays out her past and the truth hits Philip!

item.title: Chapter 25 - Therapy
item.description: Chapter 25 - Teri takes stock of her past while Ginger's revenge explodes and Danny reveals all to Phillip!

item.title: Chapter 25 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Rene Christine Jones and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 25

item.title: Chapter 24 - If The Shoe Fits
item.description: Chapter 24 - Secrets are laid bare as Phillip confronts Chloe and Jeff challenges Hector!

item.title: Chapter 24 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 24

item.title: Chapter 23 - The Last Ball
item.description: Chapter 23 - Friends reunite, Teri's time is running out and Ginger snares Chloe into a trap!

item.title: Chapter 23 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and assistant director Mark Zaricor with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 23

item.title: Chapter 22 - Secrets
item.description: Chapter 22 - Chloe and Phillip draw closer, while Teri's danger mounts and Danny hits the breaking point!

item.title: Chapter 22 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 22

item.title: Chapter 21 - Something Real
item.description: Chapter 21 - Chloe and Philip start a romantic dinner, but desert is interrupted by her black belt ex!

item.title: Chapter 21 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 21

item.title: Chapter 20 - The Second Ball
item.description: Chapter 20 - Robert teaches Tessa to hunt, Danny probes Ginger for clues and Chole lights up Philip's night.

item.title: Chapter 20 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 20

item.title: Chapter 19 - Homecoming
item.description: Chapter 19 - Tessa struggles with her sanity while Abby and Robert face off, and Jeff takes steps that will change all of their lives!

item.title: Chapter 19 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 19

item.title: Chapter 18 - In Hiding
item.description: Chapter 18 - Chloe goes undercover with help from Dennis, and Teri makes a platoon of new friends!

item.title: Chapter 18 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 18

item.title: Chapter 17 - The Face of Evil
item.description: Chapter 17 - Ginger tightens her grip on Philip, and a hit man pursues Teri while Chole and Danny race to save her!

item.title: Chapter 17 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 17

item.title: Chapter 16 - My Lunch with Philip
item.description: Chapter 16 - Chloe and Philip share lunch and secrets, while Tessa dissapears into the snow, and Danny betrays a deadly plot!

item.title: Chapter 16 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 16

item.title: Chapter 15 - Ruined Shoes
item.description: Chapter 15 - Chloe runs into Philip, who ruins her shoes but may rescue her day. Teri has fun with Danny while he faces down both Hector and the dreaded phone system!

item.title: Chapter 15 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 15

item.title: Chapter 14 - What You Are
item.description: Chapter 14 - Jeff fears that Tessa may not survive her changes. Who is Robert, and how does he hold the key to Jeff's past and possible future?

item.title: Chapter 14 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 14

item.title: Chapter 13 - Prologue
item.description: Chapter 13 - Jeff tries to take care of Tessa as she undergoes her changes, but she doesn't make it easy on him. And why was Jeff in jail, and just how did he come to be who he is?

item.title: Chapter 13 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 13

item.title: Chapter 12 - The Woodsman and the Wolf
item.description: Chapter 12 - Chloe is unsettled by what she finds in Ginger's closet, much to Teri's amusement. Tessa arrives at her hideaway, but Jeff's not far behind, and what he's after may not be what she expects.

item.title: Chapter 12 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 12

item.title: Chapter 11 - Runaway
item.description: Chapter 11 - Teri explores every inch of Danny's abs, and isn't about to be deterred by burning bacon or a hysterical Chloe. Tessa's on the run, and she discovers that there are some things you just can't run away from.

item.title: Chapter 11 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson wth live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 11

item.title: Chapter 10 - The Change Begins
item.description: Chapter 10 - Tessa wakes up in a strange place and overhears an even stranger conversation. Jeff appeals to Chloe and Ginger exercises her control.

item.title: Chapter 10 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 10

item.title: Chapter 9 - Crossroads
item.description: Chapter 9 - Tessa and Jeff get to know each other over dinner, and neither of them has a monopoly on terrible names. Teri tries to open Danny up but meets some resistance, and Ginger plans to acquire Hector's services!

item.title: Chapter 9 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 9

item.title: Chapter 8 - Dinner and Dominance
item.description: Chapter 8 - Ginger revels in her power but Teri and Danny finally get their date. Everything from cults to fetishes are discussed and Tessa wonders about Jeff's apparent gentlemanship.

item.title: Chapter 8 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 8

item.title: Chapter 7 - Intersection
item.description: Chapter 7 - The ladies meet for lunch, where secrets are revealed and oddities are discovered. Tessa struggles to confront Jeff about her strange wound and even stranger new desires. Teri fesses up about Danny Peer and confronts Chloe about ditching her, but Chloe has the perfect excuse... Philip Grayson!

item.title: Chapter 7 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 7

item.title: Chapter 6 - Who's the Fairest...
item.description: Chapter 6 - Chloe finds Hector to be a beast of a man, as Danny dishes all the dirt to Teri. Ginger revels in her control and Tessa begins to worry about Jeff.

item.title: Chapter 6 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 6

item.title: Chapter 5 - The First Ball
item.description: Chapter 5 - Ginger vows revenge on Teri, Denise just happens to have everything Chloe needs for a magical night with a certain movie star, and Hector makes a few new contacts.

item.title: Chapter 5 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 5

item.title: Chapter 4 - The Premiere
item.description: Chapter 4 - The big movie premiere is here, though it may end up being more of a punishment than anything else. Chloe gets to meet the star, who may or may not ever remember her, and Teri battles Ginger over Whoppers and Diet Coke.

item.title: Chapter 4 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director and co-writer Alicia Laine Matheson and co-writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on Once Upon a Time in Vegas chapter 4

item.title: Chapter 3 - Straying from the Path
item.description: Chapter 3 - Chloe discovers Staci is an even bigger bitch than she imagined, a certain famous movie star visits Dennis's salon, and Tessa is going to get to know Jeff... whether she wants to or not.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Beer Goggles and Red Coats
item.description: Chapter 2 - As Chloe laments her situation with Teri and Tessa, she spots Jason already with another woman... but things are more than they seem. Tessa gets some unexpected attention from a stranger and Chloe's revenge is at hand! Can you feel the we-ness?

item.title: Chapter 1 - Once Upon a Time
item.description: Chapter 1 - If fairy tales came to life, there's only one place that they could find a home... Las Vegas! Chloe's wedding fast approaches, and Tessa and Teri are none too happy with her husband-to-be. Hector and Weylan have a falling out, but hey... at least there's plenty of shrimp to eat.
